Articles.Content:
OK, first as I am running the demo still, but will be getting the game soon, I started thinking of ideas.

The SDI was born out of the MIRV I built leading to numerous ideas. For example the navy.

The carrier seems plausible using the mobile base mod, operating vtol aircraft. More for fun and machima use.

The recovery ship.

Used to recover items with a onboard Crane. This would then be taken to the space center and transferred to a truck like normal.

All ships could be built using VTOL engines to get them into place in the sea, either keeping the engines for later use, or using them with de couplers.

Trucks

Very straight froward, they clear wrecks and recover stuff.
I want to recover my capules, too. For right now, all I can do is pretend that landing strut is a crane.

I want to recover my capules, too. For right now, all I can do is pretend that landing strut is a crane.

Get Damned Robotics.

Get Damned Robotics.
Mods have cooties.
